property.name: Traits
property.value: Hobbit. Ring-bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Frodo Baggins exhausts to defend an attack, exhaust The One Ring and spend 1 ☺ resource to target the attacking enemy. Then, this attack deals no damage and each player raises his threat by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play with the top card of your deck faceup. Once per phase, you may play the top card of your deck as if it was in your hand. When playing a card this way, Gandalf is considered to have the printed Ì, Î, Ï, and Ê icons.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Noldor. Noble.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: At the end of the round, discard Galadriel from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Galadriel from your hand, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an attachment of cost 3 or less and put it into play. Put the remaining cards back in any order.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Boromir gets +2 Ú while defending against an enemy with an engagement cost higher than your threat.
Response: After Boromir takes any amount of damage, ready him.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Noldor. Noble.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: At the end of the round, discard Elrond from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Elrond enters play, choose one: heal all damage on a hero, discard a Condition attachment, or each player draws 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Bilbo Baggins enters play, search your deck for a Pipe attachment and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Add Flame of Anor to the victory display and discard the top card of your deck to ready an Istari character you control. That character gets +X Û until the end of the phase where X is the discarded card's cost.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Staff.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to Gandalf. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Gandalf's Staff to (choose one): choose a player to draw 1 card, add 1 resource to a hero's resource pool, or discard a shadow card from a non-unique enemy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Pipe.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to an Istari character. Limit 1 per character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Wizard Pipe to exchange a card in your hand with the top card of your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to the Ring-bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each hero gets +1 Ò.
Forced: After a character is destroyed, discard Fellowship of the Ring.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.
Response: After attached hero exhausts to defend an attack, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to the discarded card’s $.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Armor.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to the Ring-bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached hero gets +1 Ú and +1 hit point.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Warrior hero or Gandalf. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached hero gets +2 Û. Response: After attached character destroys an Orc enemy, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Weapon.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Noble hero or Aragorn. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached hero gets +1 Ò, +1 Û, and +1 Ú. Response: After an attack in which the attached hero defended resolves, exhaust Andúril to target the enemy that just attacked. Declare attached hero as an attacker agaisnt that enemy (and resolve the attack).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Gift.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Add Phial of Galadriel to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool, to give each enemy engaged with you –4 Û until the end of the round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Gift.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Add Three Golden Hairs to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool, to lower each player’s threat by 3. Then, each player draws 3 cards.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Gift.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Add Lórien Rope to the victory display, and remove it from the campaign pool to give each location in the staging area -2 $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Gift.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup: Attach to a hero in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Add Leaf-wrapped Lembas to the victory display and remove it from the campaign pool, to ready all heroes in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 4

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing Campaign Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player may change hero cards he controls without incurring the +1 threat penalty. The players have earned the boon cards: Sting, Mithril Shirt, Glamdring, and Andúril. Each player chooses one and adds it to his hand. If any of those boon cards remain unchosen, shuffle them into the first player's deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 4

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: If Lust for the Ring is attached to a hero, the players have earned that burden.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Lust for the Ring, Redhorn Pass, Doors of Durin and Watcher in the Water aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of the planning phase, each player places the top card of his deck faceup in front of him, in player order, until there are a total of 4 faceup cards between the players. The first player chooses 1 faceup card to player for 0 cost, 1 to add to its owners hand, 1 to discard, and 1 to shuffle into its owner's deck. Then, either shuffle Lust for the Ring into the encounter deck, or raise each player's threat by 5. Advance to stage 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Make Redhorn Pass the active location. The first player reveals cards from the encounter deck until there is at least X $ in the staging area. X is twice the number of players in the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value:
During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able.
Forced: After an enemy engages a player, place 1 damage on the active location, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and adds it to the staging area. One of those enemies must be Great Warg Chief, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value:
During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able. Forced: After a location enters play, place 1 damage on it.
Forced: After an enemy engages a player, place 1 damage on the active location, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Make Doors of Durin the active location. Add Watcher in the Water to the staging area. Discard all tokens from the Ring-bearer and place it (and each card attached to it) facedown under Watcher in the Water.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value:
There can be 2 active locations. During the travel phase, the players must travel to a location, if able. Forced: After an enemy engages a player, place 1 damage on each active location.
If Doors of Durin is explored, the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Idestructible. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot leave the staging area but is considered to be engaged with each player. Forced: After placing the 6th damage here, the first player takes control of the Ring-bearer, exhausted with 1 damage on it.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Warg.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Great Warg Chief engages you, discard cards from the encounter deck until a Warg enemy is discarded. Put that enemy into play engaged with you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Warg.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hound of Sauron gets -5 engagement cost for each enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if it was engaged this round).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Warg.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Howling Warg attacks, place 1 damage on an active location.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destoys a character, place 1 damage on an active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either exhaust a hero you control, or engage Crebain from Dunland. Forced: After Crebain from Dunland engages a player, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Redhorn Pass is explored, each player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of damage here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Progress must be placed on each other active location before it can be placed here. Progress cannot be placed here unless the first player controls the Ring-bearer.
If there are 9 damage tokens here, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Keywords
property.value: While Tree-crowned Hill is the active location, each enemy gets -1 $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Tree-crowned Hill is explored, the players, as a group, exhaust X characters in play. X is the number of damage here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Hills of Hollin is the active location, each enemy in the staging area gets +5 engagement cost.
Forced: When Hills of Hollin is explored, each player raises his threat by 1 for each damage here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Redhorn Foothills is the active location, it gains: "Forced: After an enemy is added to the staging area, it gets -5 engagement cost until the end of the round."
Forced: When Redhorn Foothills is explored, each player must discard X cards from his hand at random. X is the number of damage here.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Eregion is explored, the players as a group must discard X allies from play. X is the number of damage here.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Place 3 damage on each active location.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Undefended damage from this attack must be assigned to the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the active location. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text, "Limit 1 per location. No more than 3 progress can be placed on attached location each round.") If Snowdrifts is not attached to the active location, it gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either discard each ally he controls, or raise his threat by 1 for each ally he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either the Warg enemy in the staging area with the highest engagement cost attacks you, or each Warg enemy gets -20 engagement cost until the end of the round. If no Warg enemy is in the staging area, Storm of Howls gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 5

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing Campaign Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Shuffle the burden treachery cards Pursued by the Enemy and Shadow of Fear, into the encounter deck. Add the burden objective cards Grievous Wound and Overcome by Grief to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: The first player must choose one of the burden treachery cards (Pursued by the Enemy or Shadow of Fear), and one of the burden objective cards (Grevious Wound or Overcome by Grief) to add to the Campaign Pool. If The Balrog is still in play, the first player must choose all 4 burden cards instead. The chosen burdens have been earned by the players.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set The Balrog, The Great Bridge, and Chamber of Mazarbul aside out of play. Add Doom, Doom, Doom to the staging area and place 10 damage tokens on it. Each player adds 1 different location to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a player optionally engages an enemy, remove 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Chamber of Mazarbul to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value:
If there are no enemies in the staging area at the beginning of the quest phase, the first player reveals an additional encounter card during the staging step.
The players cannot advance unless there are X resource tokens on this stage. X is the number of players times 3.
Forced: After an enemy is defeated, place 1 resource token on this stage.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add The Great Bridge to the staging area. Each player reveals 1 encounter card and removes 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value:
No more than 5 progress can be placed on this stage each round.
The players cannot defeat this stage while The Great Bridge is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Traits
property.value: Shadow. Flame.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, remove 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom. Then, if there are no damage tokens here, add The Balrog to the staging area.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, The Balrog makes an attack if it is in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Traits
property.value: Balrog. Shadow. Flame.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Indestructible. Cannot be optionally engaged. The Balrog and shadow cards dealt to The Balrog are immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: While in the staging area, The Balrog is considered to be engaged with the first player and only the first player can declare attackers against The Balrog.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have attachments. Allies cannot defend against Orc-chieftan.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Orc-chieftan engages the first player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each point of excess combat damage dealt by Great Cave-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) remove 1 progress from the current quest.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Uruk from Mordor makes an attack against the first player.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û. If this attack destroys a character, attacking enemy makes an additional attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either remove 1 damage from Doom, Doom, Doom, or reveal an additional encounter card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: The defending player raises his threat by 1 for each enemy engaged with him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Archery 2.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of players in the game.
When Revealed: Assign X damage among characters you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Traits
property.value: Underground. Bridge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When The Great Bridge is explored, discard a hero from play to deal X damage to The Balrog. X is that hero's threat cost. Then, The Balrog loses all keywords for the remainder of the game. Any player may trigger this response.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value:
The players cannot advance to the next stage.
Travel: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different enemy and adds it to the staging area to travel here. One of those enemies must be Orc-chieftan, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: While Mines of Moria is in the staging area, progress must be placed on Mines of Moria before it can be placed on the current quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending player discards a non-objective attachment he controls (2 non-objective attachments instead if his threat is 35 or higher).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: Many-pillard Hall gets +1 $ for each Many-pillared Hall in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending player's threat is 35 or higher).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Darkened Stairway is explored, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If the discarded card is a location, add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Ancient Guardroom is the active location, each enemy in play gets –1 Û.
Travel: Discard the top card of the encounter deck to travel here. Each player raises his threat by X, where X is the discarded card's $.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded. X is the number of players in the game. Add each enemy discarded this way to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player assigns X damage among characters he controls. X is the number of exhausted characters he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Assign X damage among characters you control. X is the number of enemies engaged with you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove a character you control from the quest and discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that character's printed Ò is less than the discarded card's $, discard that character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove 1 damage token from Doom, Doom, Doom, or The Balrog makes an attack, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, reveal 1 card from the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 6

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing Campaign Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Starting with the first player, each player chooses 1 of the following boon cards: Phial of Galadriel, Three Golden Hairs, Lórien Rope, or Leaf-wrapped Lembas, and attaches it to a hero he controls. The chosen boon cards have been earned by the players. Shuffle Followed by Night and Ill Fate into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Lord of the Rings Part 6

property.name: Text
property.value:
Resolution: If Fallen into Evil is attached to a hero, add that hero to the list of Fallen Heroes in the Campaign Log.
The first player chooses either Followed by Night or Ill Fate to be added to the Campaign Pool. The chosen burden card has been earned by the players.
Each player chooses 1 hero he controls (other than the Ring-bearer or Aragorn) to be taken captive. Record the name of each "captive" in the Notes section of the Campaign Log.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Frodo's Choice, Seat of Seeing, and Parth Galen aside, out of play. Add The Argonath and Sarn Gebir to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value:
Enemies get +2 Ú and cannot be engaged. Skip the encounter phase.
The players cannot advance while The Argonath is in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove the Ring-bearer, and each card attached to it, from the game (treat The One Ring's text as blank while resolving this effect). Reduce each enemy's engagement cost to 0 until the end of the engagement phase. Skip the travel phase this round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, shuffle the Seat of Seeing and Frodo's Choice into the encounter discard pile. Then, place the encounter discard pile on the bottom of the encounter deck. Starting with the first player, each player creates his own staging area and advances to a different stage 3A of his choice. In player order, each player moves 1 encounter card from this staging area to his. When there are no encounter cards left at this stage, discard it.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total $ of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.
Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.
Response: After you quest successfully, discard a non-unique location in any staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total $ of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.
Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.
Response: After you quest successfully, choose a player. Ready each of that player's heroes.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total $ of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.
Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.
Response: After you quest successfully, choose a player. That player draws 2 cards and lowers his threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After stage 2B is discarded, if the total $ of encounter cards in this staging area is less than 4, reveal 1 encounter card.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Frodo's Choice is not in play, any time players would place progress on this quest, discard an equal number of cards from the encounter deck instead.
Forced: After Frodo's Choice is revealed at this stage, advance to stage 4A.
Response: After you quest successfully, discard an enemy engaged with a player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Parth Galen to the staging area. If it is your quest phase, end the phase (do not resolve the quest).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value:
During the quest phase, reveal 1 additional encounter card for each player in the game. Response: After an enemy is revealed at this stage, raise your threat by X to engage that enemy. X is that enemy's $. Each player (at any stage) may trigger this ability once per round.
When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Keywords
property.value: If Frodo's Choice is discarded, reveal it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Take control of the first player token and the Ring-bearer (and each card attached to it). Attach to the Ring-bearer. For the rest of the game, you cannot lose control of the first player token.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk-hai.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Toughness 2. Cannot have attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Allies with fewer printed hit points than Uruk-hai Captain cannot defend against Uruk-hai Captain.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk-hai.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Toughness 1. Archery X.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of players at this stage.
When Revealed: Discard an ally you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Traits
property.value: Orc. Uruk-hai.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Surge. Toughness 1. Archery 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uruk-hai Tracker gets +2 Û against characters with 2 or fewer printed hit points.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard a non-objective attachment you control.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.value: Orc. Uruk-hai.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Toughness 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either choose a player to reveal an encounter card, or Uruk-hai Hunter makes an immediate attack against you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Traits
property.value: River. Lawn.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck. While Parth Galen is in play, the players cannot win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When Seat of Seeing is explored, choose a burden card in play, in the encounter deck, or in the discard pile, and remove it from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck. (If you are playing campaign mode, remove that card from the Campaign Pool.)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. X is the number of players in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: The players cannot travel here while Sarn Gebir is in play. While The Argonath is the active location, skip the combat phase.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Sarn Gebir is explored, deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: While River Anduin is in the staging area it gains: "Forced: At the end of the travel phase, each player at this stage raises his threat by 1. Then, River Anduin moves to the staging area to the left, if able."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Traits

property.name: Keywords
property.value: While Wooded Shoreline is in the staging area, it gains archery 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for an enemy and add it to the staging area to travel here. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. Hills.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: A player at this staging area must engage an enemy in any staging area to travel here.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either move 1 enemy engaged with you to the first player's staging area, or Growing Threat gains doomed 2 and surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack, move attacking enemy to the first player's staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove all damage from each enemy at this stage. Each enemy at this stage gets +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy, this attack is considered undefended.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Until the end of the round, add 1 to the archery total at this stage for each ally currently at this stage.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if the defending character has fewer printed hit points than the attacking enemy).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to a hero and move it to the first player's staging area. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero loses the hero card type and gains the enemy card type with $ equal to its Ò and engagement cost equal to its threat cost. If Fallen into Evil is discarded, return attached hero to its owner's control."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Ring Goes South

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to a non-☺ hero in play. Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After The One Ring exhausts, raise each player's threat by 1 and reduce attached hero's Ò to 0 until the end of the round."

property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.value: Doomed 1. Surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Treat the printed text box of each character in play as blank (except for Traits) until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Defending character does not count its Ú.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 1. Surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each enemy engaged with a player, and not in the staging area, makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Overcome by Grief to the staging area. Forced: After a character is destroyed, if Overcome by Grief is unattached, attach to a hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After a character you control is destroyed, exhaust attached hero. Until the end of the round, attached hero cannot ready.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey in the Dark

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Grievous Wound to the staging area. Forced: After a hero takes damage, if Grievous Wound is unattached, attach to that hero. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After attached hero exhausts, deal 1 damage to it.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Put the topmost enemy of the encounter deck discard pile into play engaged with you.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Breaking of the Fellowship

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Peril. Surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to a hero you control. (Counts as a Condition Attachment with the text: "Forced: After a character you control is destroyed, raise your threat by 2.")

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Ring.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer. Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero.
If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.
